ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, firstly: Cyndro is a base. He s the mind of the Element, so when Jen says that he s firing, its the base defences firing at you, so she s allright there.

Ok, firstly: Cyndro is a base. He's the mind of the Element, so when 
Jen says that he's firing, its the base defences firing at you, so 
she's allright there. As for not taking damage, we'll get her if she 
keeps doing it.

Now, secondly, my fellow council members already took care of this, 
but KSL and Soulstice, quit it. If there's another argument like that 
involving you guys over the RPG, teeeerrrriiibllle things will happen.

Thirdly, about the shockwaves: no, shockwaves from missiles are ok. 
That rule outlaws shockwaves like the ones Vehement fires, 
Shockwave's x-ray blast, and the Element's shockwaves.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
>  <<Cyndro focused his firepower on the attackers. Three missiles 
> launched out at Sixshot, and three at Ares, followed by alot of 
plasma shots 
> at both. He also fired four missiles at Imprisoner.>>
> 
> An aiming ten missiles shot from one of Jen's characters...utterly 
amazing.  
> Also, the fact that only a few of my shots that I fired upon her 
hit only a 
> single character :)
> 
> Resisting urge to fight fire with fire.
